string.name: jeanOverview_txt
string.p: Jean Gunnhildr is a playable Anemo character in Genshin Impact. She is the daughter of Frederica Gunnhildr and Seamus Pegg, and the older sister of Barbara.

string.name: jeanOverview2_txt
string.p: A descendant of the prestigious Gunnhildr Clan, Jean is the Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favoius. She is always busy handling unrest across Mondstadt and of course, tirelessly working to maintain the City of Freedom.
